directions.step:
1. Combine sugar, vinegar and butter in a heavy saucepan.
2. Cook, stirring constantly, until mixture reaches 270 degrees on a candy thermometer or to the hard crack stage.
3. Fold in nuts and pour onto a buttered cookie sheet.
4. Mark into squares while warm.
5. This is an excellent hard candy.
